com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx

Class LynxDcMotorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxCommExceptionHandler
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxController
        • com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxDcMotorController

  • public class LynxDcMotorController
extends LynxController
    LynxDcMotorController implements motor controller semantics on Lynx module

      • internalGetMotorChannelMode

        protected DcMotor.RunMode internalGetMotorChannelMode(int motorZ)
        like internalGetPublicMotorMode(int), but ALWAYS returns a value that can be set with LynxSetMotorChannelModeCommand. We also don't here update lastKnownMode.
        See Also:
        internalGetPublicMotorMode(int)
